title: Cleanup Milestones
body: Can outstanding issues for [MSBuild 15.5](https://github.com/Microsoft/msbuild/milestone/17) and [MSBuild 15.6](https://github.com/Microsoft/msbuild/milestone/18) be closed and/or updated to appropriate milestones?  Seems like these are a little outdated.

nodes.body: Closing as this appears to have been addressed at some point.
